article: Here is a picture. The weather is terrible. It's _ . The Li family is at home. Mr. Li is sitting in a chair. He is very tall _ a little bit heavy. He is reading a newspaper. He's _ English teacher. He teaches very _ . His students like _ very much. Mrs. Li is sitting on the bed. She is _ medium height and beautiful. She is watching TV. Mr. and Mrs. Li have two sons and a daughter. Li Zhigang is _ the desk. He is writing to his pen pal in Canada. Li Zhiwei is at the desk, too. He is doing _ homework. Li Zhigang and Li Zhiwei are _ of No. 1 Middle School. They like playing soccer. Li Zhiyan is their _ . She is only four. She has long straight hair. She is wearing a red dress. She's sitting on the floor.  She is playing with her cat.
